alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 23 at 9:17PM EDT until May 24 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT/2 AM EDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and Panhandle Florida, including the following areas, in Big Bend Florida, Coastal Dixie, Coastal Franklin, Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Taylor, Coastal Wakulla, Gadsden, Inland Dixie, Inland Franklin, Inland Jefferson, Inland Taylor, Inland Wakulla, Lafayette, Leon, Liberty and Madison. In Panhandle Florida, Coastal Gulf and Inland Gulf. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT/2 AM EDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain will remain a threat over the Florida Big Bend region for the rest of this evening. Rainfall of around 4 inches will be possible under slow-moving thunderstorms. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Leon
